author: morten
msg: Fix for a certain combination of absolute path patterns and ancestor patterns,

author: morten
msg: Fix for passing node-sets as parameters into a template with a for-each loop.
The ForEach class resets its node iterator by default. This behaviour is not
desierd for iterators that are passed in through a parameter, so I added an
it-test that checks if the iterator is of type 'Reference'.

author: morten
msg: Fix for grouping a sequence of text nodes inside one CDATA section.

author: morten
msg: Fix to prevent escaping of attribute values in HTML output.

author: morten
msg: Added code behind the document() function to force the parser to be
namespace aware (Crimson is pr. default, Xerces is not).
